nodes.text: Tollopher was a male Human who served in the Republic Army during the Galactic War with the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the Quesh war on the planet Quesh, he was stationed at the Republic Operational Headquarters.

Tollopher appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Mods Vendor for Republic players on Quesh. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, Tollopher was removed from the game along with the rest of the Mods Vendors. His position is also marked on a map in Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, a game guide released by Prima Games.
